title: Sports Performance Package
description: Designed for athletes and active individuals to optimize performance, speed up recovery, and prevent injuries. This comprehensive package combines targeted IV therapy, performance blood analysis, and expert physiotherapy.

included.name: Athletic Recovery IV
included.description: Amino acids, electrolytes, and anti-inflammatory nutrients to speed muscle recovery and reduce soreness

included.name: Sports Performance Panel
included.description: Tests for key markers including iron, vitamin D, testosterone, cortisol, and inflammation levels

included.name: Sports Physiotherapy Assessment
included.description: Full movement analysis, muscle testing, and personalized recovery plan with sports specialist
